search_results.title: Don Kerr
search_results.snippet: Biography ... Don Kerr was as a poet with a unique Prairie voice. He wrote with nuance and love about Saskatchewan and Saskatoon, where he was born, and stressed ...

search_results.title: Saskatoon poet, professor and historian Don Kerr ...
search_results.snippet: Former Saskatchewan poet laureate, historian, playwright and English professor Don Kerr died this week. He was 84.

search_results.title: Dr. Don Kerr - King's University College
search_results.snippet: Don Kerr is a demographer who teaches at Kings University College at Western University. From 1992 - 2000 he worked in Demography Division at Statistics Canada.
